title: Jimmy Steps Out / Pot o' Gold (1941) directed by George Marshall | Colorized Movie | Subtitled

sources.title: Jimmy Steps Out / Pot o' Gold (1941) directed by George Marshall | Colorized Movie | Subtitled
sources.description:
For the time of your life...and a lifetime of fun...the swingiest singiest danciest romanciest picture of the year!  

Original title: Pot o' Gold (1941) Also known as: Jimmy Steps Out

B&W version https://youtu.be/SMYknkIn60E

Director: George Marshall
Writers: Walter DeLeon, Andrew Bennison
Stars: James Stewart, Paulette Goddard, Horace Heidt 
Genres: Colorized classics, Musical, Comedy, Romance

This film has dubbed audio in Italian & Spanish.
